an8.22:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vajjisu viharati hatthigame.
an8.22:1.3: “atthahi, bhikkhave, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagatam uggam gahapatim hatthigamakam dharetha”ti.
an8.22:1.5: Idam vatvana sugato utthayasana viharam pavisi.
an8.22:2.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena uggassa gahapatino hatthigamakassa nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
an8.22:2.2: Atha kho uggo gahapati hatthigamako yena so bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva tam bhikkhum abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho uggam gahapatim hatthigamakam so bhikkhu etadavoca:
an8.22:2.3: “atthahi kho tvam, gahapati, acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagato bhagavata byakato.
an8.22:2.4: Katame te, gahapati, attha acchariya abbhuta dhamma, yehi tvam samannagato bhagavata byakato”ti?
an8.22:3.2: ‘katamehi atthahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagato bhagavata byakato’ti.
an8.22:3.3: Api ca, bhante, ye me attha acchariya abbhuta dhamma samvijjanti,
an8.22:3.4: tam sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
an8.22:3.5: “Evam, gahapati”ti kho so bhikkhu uggassa gahapatino hatthigamakassa paccassosi.
an8.22:3.7: “yadaham, bhante, nagavane paricaranto bhagavantam pathamam duratova addasam;
an8.22:3.8: saha dassaneneva me, bhante, bhagavato cittam pasidi, suramado ca pahiyi.
an8.22:3.9: Ayam kho me, bhante, pathamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo samvijjati.
an8.22:4.1: So kho aham, bhante, pasannacitto bhagavantam payirupasim.
an8.22:4.2: Tassa me bhagava anupubbim katham kathesi, seyyathidam—
an8.22:4.3: danakatham silakatham saggakatham; kamanam adinavam okaram sankilesam, nekkhamme anisamsam pakasesi.
an8.22:4.4: Yada mam bhagava annasi kallacittam muducittam vinivaranacittam udaggacittam pasannacittam, atha ya buddhanam samukkamsika dhammadesana tam pakasesi—
an8.22:4.6: Seyyathapi nama suddham vattham apagatakalakam sammadeva rajanam patigganheyya;
an8.22:4.7: evamevam kho me tasmimyeva asane virajam vitamalam dhammacakkhum udapadi:
an8.22:4.9: So kho aham, bhante, ditthadhammo pattadhammo viditadhammo pariyogalhadhammo tinnavicikiccho vigatakathankatho vesarajjappatto aparappaccayo satthusasane tattheva buddhanca dhammanca sanghanca saranam agamasim, brahmacariyapancamani ca sikkhapadani samadiyim.
an8.22:4.10: Ayam kho me, bhante, dutiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo samvijjati.
an8.22:5.1: Tassa mayham, bhante, catasso komariyo pajapatiyo ahesum.
an8.22:5.2: Atha khvaham, bhante, yena ta pajapatiyo tenupasankamim; upasankamitva ta pajapatiyo etadavacam:
an8.22:5.4: Ya icchati sa idheva bhoge ca bhunjatu punnani ca karotu, sakani va natikulani gacchatu.
an8.22:5.5: Hoti va pana purisadhippayo, kassa vo dammi’ti?
an8.22:5.6: Evam vutte, sa, bhante, jettha pajapati mam etadavoca:
an8.22:5.8: Atha kho aham, bhante, tam purisam pakkosapetva vamena hatthena pajapatim gahetva dakkhinena hatthena bhingaram gahetva tassa purisassa onojesim.
an8.22:5.9: Komarim kho panaham, bhante, daram pariccajanto nabhijanami cittassa annathattam.
an8.22:5.10: Ayam kho me, bhante, tatiyo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo samvijjati.
an8.22:6.1: Samvijjanti kho pana me, bhante, kule bhoga.
an8.22:6.2: Te ca kho appativibhatta silavantehi kalyanadhammehi.
an8.22:6.3: Ayam kho me, bhante, catuttho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo samvijjati.
an8.22:7.1: Yam kho panaham, bhante, bhikkhum payirupasami;
an8.22:7.3: So ce me ayasma dhammam deseti;
an8.22:7.5: No ce me so ayasma dhammam deseti, ahamassa dhammam desemi.
an8.22:7.6: Ayam kho me, bhante, pancamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo samvijjati.
an8.22:8.1: Anacchariyam kho pana, bhante, sanghe nimantite devata upasankamitva arocenti:
an8.22:8.2: ‘asuko, gahapati, bhikkhu ubhatobhagavimutto asuko pannavimutto asuko kayasakkhi asuko ditthippatto asuko saddhavimutto asuko dhammanusari asuko saddhanusari asuko silava kalyanadhammo asuko dussilo papadhammo’ti.
an8.22:8.3: Sangham kho panaham, bhante, parivisanto nabhijanami evam cittam uppadento:
an8.22:8.4: ‘imassa va thokam demi imassa va bahukan’ti.
an8.22:8.6: Ayam kho me, bhante, chattho acchariyo abbhuto dhammo samvijjati.
an8.22:9.1: Anacchariyam kho pana mam, bhante, devata upasankamitva arocenti:
an8.22:9.3: Evam vutte, aham, bhante, ta devata evam vademi:
an8.22:9.4: ‘vadeyyatha va evam kho tumhe devata no va vadeyyatha, atha kho svakkhato bhagavata dhammo’ti.
an8.22:9.5: Na kho panaham, bhante, abhijanami tatonidanam cittassa unnatim:
an8.22:9.6: ‘mam ta devata upasankamanti, aham va devatahi saddhim sallapami’ti.
an8.22:9.7: Ayam kho me, bhante, sattamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo samvijjati.
an8.22:10.1: Sace kho panaham, bhante, bhagavato pathamataram kalam kareyyam, anacchariyam kho panetam yam mam bhagava evam byakareyya:
an8.22:10.2: ‘natthi tam samyojanam yena samyutto uggo gahapati hatthigamako puna imam lokam agaccheyya’ti.
an8.22:10.3: Ayam kho me, bhante, atthamo acchariyo abbhuto dhammo samvijjati.
an8.22:11.1: Ime kho me, bhante, attha acchariya abbhuta dhamma samvijjanti.
an8.22:11.3: ‘katamehi caham atthahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagato bhagavata byakato’”ti.
an8.22:12.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu uggassa gahapatino hatthigamakassa nivesane pindapatam gahetva utthayasana pakkami.
an8.22:12.2: Atha kho so bhikkhu pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
an8.22:12.3: Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu yavatako ahosi uggena gahapatina hatthigamakena saddhim kathasallapo, tam sabbam bhagavato arocesi.
an8.22:13.2: Yatha tam uggo gahapati hatthigamako samma byakaramano byakareyya, imeheva kho, bhikkhu, atthahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagato uggo gahapati hatthigamako maya byakato.
an8.22:13.3: Imehi ca pana, bhikkhu, atthahi acchariyehi abbhutehi dhammehi samannagatam uggam gahapatim hatthigamakam dharehi”ti.
